content: For the Aussies who couldn't make it to the HL7 meeting last week, or for those who just couldn't get enough FHIR and want more, there will be a FHIR meetup in Sydney on February 27th, hosted by Medical Director at Level 5, 477 Pitt Street, Haymarket, from 6pm. Get more info and your (free) tickets at https://www.eventbrite.com.au/e/sydney-fhir-community-meet-up-tickets-88991759749
